item.description:
Join us for a two hour AMC hike in Sandwich to the Ryder Woods Conservation Land and the Lowell Holly Reservation.

Breakfast at 8:30 at Marshland Too, 315 Cotuit Rd #2 in Sandwich (Following the directions below- you turn right at Cotuit Road and Marshland Too is in the plaza with the Aubuchon hardware about a quarter of a mile down the road. NB- This is not the main Marshland restaurant on Route 6a but run by the same people.)

Hike directions-

Rte 6 to exit 3, take Quaker Meetinghouse Rd. 2.5 miles south to lights at Cotuit Rd. Turn L for 2.3 miles. Turn right on South Sandwich Road. Ryder Conservation Lands parking will be on right after 0.2 miles.

Scenic hike to Lowell Holly Reservation with views of Mashpee- Wakeby pond. Meet at 9:45 AM start at 10 AM. 2 hrs

Date(s): January 31, 2013 (Thu) Location: Cape Hikes,  Massachusetts, Cape Cod,  MA Difficulty: C3C Offered By: Southeastern Massachusetts Leader: Jane Harding 
508-833-2864 (best time to call: Before 9 PM) 
(Email this contact person.)

AMC membership and registration is not required for this activity. However, you may wish to visit the AMC website at www.outdoors.org for information on membership.

Contact the hike leader if you have any questions on the hike. Questions on the breakfast go to us.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Sandwich, Ryder Conservation Hike
